attributes.action: stop any HGV limited to 56mph from driving in the middle lane of the motorway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who has had to drive down a motorway during rush hour will have noticed that many HGV's are now using the middle lane - this effectively reduces the speed in lane 2 down to 56mph and reduces the capacity of the UK motorways!
